name: Solitaire for Cash
description:
Welcome to Solitaire for Cash game! This is a Brand New Klondike Solitaire Card Game where you can win lots of real world cash and prizes!

Playing the game, competing scores with players from all over the world, participating in tournaments to win cash prizes! More importantly, no any ads interrupting your game experience! Download the game now and make this a reality!

After downloading the game for FREE, you can start playing Practices or Cash Tournaments.Good luck & have fun!

Game Features:
• Draw 1 card - Relax and keep the brain thinking
• Comfortable game controls - Tap and Swipe to move cards
• Excellent visual experience - Amazing graphics and beautiful game themes
• Skillz Random ensures fairness in player matching and gameplay conditions so only the most skilled competitor wins!
• Beat the clock for the highest scores!

If you have any questions feel free to reach us at dailypuzzle@hotmail.com
If you have any questions about the Skillz system or cash tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com
